definition: reign title/era name (name for either the entire reign of an emperor or one part of it)/year number (such as 2016 or 甲子)
surname Nian
year/CL:個|个[ge4]
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people
roar/cry/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: There are various ideological connotations in the reign-titles of Chinese feudal emperors in different periods.
sentences.chinese: 不同時期封建帝王的年號，均包含着豐富的思想內涵。

sentences.english: The following year the first month to establish Dashun regime era name Yongchang.
sentences.chinese: 次年正月，建立大順政權，年號永昌。

sentences.english: Why do some porcelain wares hare reign-Marks, while others don't?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有的瓷器上面有年號款，有的沒有呢？

definition: official name of a nation (includes dynastic names of China: 漢|汉[Han4], 唐[Tang2] etc)
to avoid a taboo word or topic
to avoid a taboo word or topic/to refrain from/to avoid
to number the years/calendar era/annals/chronicle
